ComicInfo.Summary:
Dougie and Ivor are back and more uncouth than ever in the second issue of Garth Ennis and John McCrea's newly colorized and re-mastered series that is guaranteed to offend and amaze. No one can imagine the depth of depravity these two 'private investigators' will sink to in order to complete their job. But we can tell you that it's impossible to read the story without laughing at the level of nonsense these two get up to. Also including classic back-up strips like Trio the Whore, and Bad Ideas for Superheroes! This series is made for the smart ass comics reader that can't get enough low-brow humor as only Garth Ennis can deliver! Available with a regular cover, a very Offensive cover, and a special Classic B&W cover showing one of the lost Dicks covers of yesteryear - all by series artist John McCrea!
*Notes:* The regular cover is a homage of the cover of Giant-Size X-Men #1.
ComicInfo.Title: The Big Hairy Twat; Just Gimme a Beer; Gusty Caesar; The Wanker's History of Wanking; Trio The Fucking Whore: There's a Party in Her Mouth and You're Invited!; How the Fuck Did They Do That?: Them Dicks Stunts Explained!
